titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Necrology files

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.otherfindaid: Finding aid and name index in the library.

archdesc.bioghist: Record series maintained by the University of Michigan Alumni Records upon receiving notification of the death of an alumnus or alumna. After 1968 the office no longer segregated files of deceased alumni.
archdesc.scopecontent: Contains more than 64,000 alphabetically arranged folders on students that attended the University of Michigan and were deceased as of 1968, including graduates, non-graduates, some honorary degree recipients, faculty, and officers. Files contain biographical information such as alumni catalog questionnaires, registration forms, news articles, and some correspondence and photographs. Includes a separate series of war dead covering World War I, World War II, and the Korean War.
